类 net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast.Token
的使用

  • 使用Token的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast  

    • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast中Token的使用

      声明为Token的net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      Token ParseException.currentToken
      This is the last token that has been consumed successfully.
      Token JspParser.jj_nt
      Next token.
      Token Token.next
      A reference to the next regular (non-special) token from the input stream.
      Token Token.specialToken
      This field is used to access special tokens that occur prior to this token, but after the immediately preceding regular (non-special) token.
      Token JspParser.token
      Current token.
      返回Token的net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Token JspParserTokenManager.getNextToken()
      Get the next Token.
      Token JspParser.getNextToken()
      Get the next Token.
      Token JspParser.getToken(int index)
      Get the specific Token.
      protected Token JspParserTokenManager.jjFillToken() 
      static Token Token.newToken(int ofKind) 
      static Token Token.newToken(int ofKind, String image)
      Returns a new Token object, by default.
      参数类型为Token的net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.jsp.ast中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ParseException(Token currentTokenVal, int[][] expectedTokenSequencesVal, String[] tokenImageVal)
      This constructor is used by the method "generateParseException" in the generated parser.
